retroPrompt: Generate an Agile Retrospective meeting template based on a theme. The template should be presented in sections and the theme should be applied humourously. Give the retro a catchy name based on the theme. Participants in the meeting should be able to reflect on what has worked well in their last sprint, and what could be improved. It should also capture any action items the participants want to address in the next sprint. The theme for the retro template is:
